lines.text: ...Well I’ll be. You were actually on the money, kid.
Of course I was right! All I ever say is completely correct ideas!
That ain’t even slightly true, but I’ll let it sli-
You small-minded FOOLS! You’d have done best to leave us BE!
Indeed! Your confounded persistence will be your doom!
Heheheh... sorry, fellas. But Leo just gave me free rein, so…
